snippet: President Dmitri A. Medvedev of Russia said that he and Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin had not decided to switch places during a fishing trip, as some have suggested.
lead_paragraph: President Dmitri A. Medvedev of Russia said that he and Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin had not decided to switch places during a fishing trip, as some have suggested.

headline.main: Medvedev Says Leader Plan Was Studied
headline.print_headline: Medvedev Says Leader Plan Was Studied
headline.seo: Medvedev Again Defends Leadership Plan as Carefully Studied
